"Poppoâ™ª It's Popona!
Listen to this, I just came up with an amazing idea!"
"I should scout some people from ARKS to fight for the Knights of Aries!"
"The only thing is, I still don't know much about what people in ARKS are like..."
"So before I do anything, I want to get some advice from experts in their field!"
"So, could you find some experts and ask them how they'd go about choosing who to recruit?"
